pkgmetadata.longdescription: # django-redirect-to-non-wwwRedirects www URL address to non-www.## Installation```bashpip install django-redirect-to-non-www``````bashpip install git+https://git@github.com/lukasvinclav/django-redirect-to-non-www.git```## ConfigurationOpen your settings file and append middleware **redirect_to_non_www.middleware.RedirectToNonWww** at the end of **MIDDLEWARE** list.```pythonMIDDLEWARE = [ # Other middleware classes 'redirect_to_non_www.middleware.RedirectToNonWww',]```
